name: Dark Debt
description: You target an adjacent allied creature and alter their fate. Until the end of their next full rest, the first time the creature reaches 0 health, they instantly recover 10 health. If the creature dies before they complete their next full rest, they must roll a 1d4. On a 1, they reanimate as a standard level undead creature of your choice and are permanently maddened unless controlled by the Command Undead action or similar ability.
